info.author: Erik Max Francis
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
This module allows simple experimentation with the lambda
calculus, first developed by Church.  It understands the different
types of lambda expressions, can extract lists of variables (both
free and bound) and subterms, and can simplify complicated by
expression by means of application.
info.name: PyChurch
info.summary: A simple but full-featured module for exploring lambda calculus
info.html_description: This module allows simple experimentation with the lambda calculus, first developed by Church. It understands the different types of lambda expressions, can extract lists of variables (both free and bound) and subterms, and can simplify complicated by expression by means of application.
